category.name: Verbial
category.caption: <u>V</u>erbial
category.title: main relation in a scene (state, action or movement) with its auxilliaries, modals and secondary verbs

category.caption: a<u>D</u>verbial
category.name: aDverbial
category.title: adds more information about the scene; not a participant, but a relation

category.name: Center
category.caption: <u>C</u>enter
category.title: an entity comprising a complex unit (the relations in the complex units are either E or L)

category.name: Elaborator
category.caption: <u>E</u>laborator
category.title: a unary relation applied to a C to form a complex unit

category.name: Linked U
category.caption: linked <u>U</u>nit
category.title: one or more scenes linked by a linker or autonomous

category.name: Linker
category.caption: <u>L</u>inker
category.title: a relation between one or more (but usually two) scenes.

category.name: Ground
category.caption: <u>G</u>round
category.title: a scene describing the point from which another scene is conceived

category.name: Stage
category.caption: <u>S</u>tage
category.title: a scene conceived by another scene
